name: Ball of Rage (S1SUU)
description:
PRESS SPACE TO JUMP

This game was made for the University of Europe with instruction from Professor Csongor Baranyai. 

The song at the end of the game is made by me with BeepBox and the entire game was made with Unity Bolt, a visual scripting plugin for the Unity engine. 

This game is a part of the game-a-week course.
